id.co.veritrans.mdk.v1.gateway

Interface VtGateway

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VtDirect, VtWeb
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultVtDirect, DefaultVtGateway, DefaultVtWeb

    public interface VtGateway
    VT Gateway.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VtResponse approve(java.lang.String orderId)
      Approve a charge transaction which has challenge ChargeResult.
      VtResponse cancel(java.lang.String orderId)
      Cancel a charge transaction which has been processed.
      VtResponse status(java.lang.String orderId)
      Get the status of a transaction using the orderId from the charge request.
